A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie! Luke has great moments as a reluctant legend. Leia has great moments including one using the force. Kylo has a kick bit scene. All the acting is good\, and every character who appears\, even for a fleeting moment\, has nice moments. Very enjoyable. It doesn't have a George Lucas feel\, but maybe that's good\, in that Lucas didn't always hit a home run. I look forward to seeing it again.
